column3: You were walking on the moon and now your feeling low
column4: What they said wasn't true,, you're beautiful
column5: Sticks and stones break your bones,, I know what you're feeling
column6: Words like those won't steal your glow
column7: You're one in a million this
column10: This is for all the girls boys all over
column11: The world whatever you've been told
column13: So hold your head up high
column14: It's your time to shine from the inside it
column15: Shows your worth more than gold
column21: Well,, everybody keeps score,, afraid you're gonna lose
column22: Just ignore,, they don't know the real you
column23: All the rain in the sky can't put out your fire
column24: Of all the stars out tonight,, you shine brighter
column30: So,, don't let anybody tell you that you're not loved
column31: And don't let anybody tell you that you're not enough
column32: Yeah,, there are days that we all feel like we're messed up
column33: But the truth is that we're all diamonds in the rough
column34: So,, don't be ashamed to wear your crown
column35: You're a king,, you're a queen,, inside and out
column36: You glow like the moon,, you shine like the stars
column37: This is for you,, wherever you are
column41: This,, this is for all the girls,, boys all over the world
column42: Whatever you've been told,, you're worth more than gold
column43: (So hold your head) So hold your head up high
